title: Golden Triangle
inclusions_evidence: "Hotels (6 nights), comfortable tented camp (1 night)", "Transport by private vehicle, taxis, auto-rickshaw, cycle-rickshaw", "Services of a CEO (Chief Experience Officer) throughout, local guides", "Airfares & transfers are additional"

hotel.name_or_hint: Hotels (6 nights) + comfortable tented camp (1 night) per itinerary

items.label: Local transport (private vehicle, taxis, auto-rickshaw, cycle-rickshaw)
Services of CEO and local guides
G for Good experiences (Women With Wheels, City Walk, Block Printing)

other.notes: This package is a guided 8-day G Adventures tour including accommodation (6 hotel nights + 1 tented camp night), transport and guides. Airfares and transfers are explicitly stated as additional on the deal page. Reliable DIY supplier prices (hotels, tour bookings, and flights) could not be obtained from external booking sites within this analysis.

reasoning: The packaged G Adventures tour at 1189.0 pp for an 8-day itinerary (7 nights accommodation including a tented camp), CEO and local guides, and on-tour transport represents reasonably strong value for a guided small-group trip given inclusions. Flights and airport transfers are excluded, reducing direct comparability to DIY totals; I could not reliably source comparable DIY prices from booking sites in this analysis, so numerical savings cannot be calculated.
additional_notes: Deal page notes a SAVE 30% promotion and an in-store Bundle + Save offer (SAVE 500 per booking) and shows an expiry—these could affect net price if applied. The provided top-level 'nights' (6) differs from the itinerary text stating 7 nights accommodation.
